protein.specific_function: Transfers the glycosyl residue from UDP-Glc to the non-reducing end of alpha-1,4-glucan.

reference.reference_text: Nuttall FQ, Gannon MC, Bai G, Lee EY: Primary structure of human liver glycogen synthase deduced by cDNA cloning. Arch Biochem Biophys. 1994 Jun;311(2):443-9.
